meanings.definition: The quality or state of being characterized by growthinesses.
meanings.sent1: The growthinesses of the plant were evident in its tall, green stems.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was due to the steady growthinesses of its sales.
meanings.sent3: The growthinesses of the cake batter made it rise beautifully in the oven.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude had a contagious growthinesses that spread to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The growthinesses of the forest after the rain was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The act or process of experiencing growthinesses.
meanings.sent1: Watching the growthinesses of the flowers in the garden brought her joy.
meanings.sent2: The growthinesses of the economy led to new job opportunities for many.
meanings.sent3: The growthinesses of the puppy's tail wagging showed how happy he was.
meanings.sent4: The growthinesses of the city was evident in the new buildings popping up everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The growthinesses of the child's vocabulary was impressive for his age.
